## Markdown() function

Renders Github-Flavored Markdown from the Knowledge Graph. This Markdown can include arbitrary HTML. Any HTML will be sanitized according to Rehype's default Schema.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function Markdown({ content, responseId, className }: MarkdownProps): React.JSX.Element;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { content, responseId, className } | [MarkdownProps](./chat-ui-react.markdownprops.md) |  |

**Returns:**

React.JSX.Element

## Remarks

A link click will send a CHAT\_LINK\_CLICK analytics event
